spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout resembles the plan (open kitchen/dining at left, living central, two bedrooms at right, bath near center-right), but several spatial mismatches exist. Notable deviations include a staircase/level-change element inserted in the living area, inconsistent interior wall segment lengths (especially around hall/bath/bedroom junction), and multiple door locations/orientations that do not match the 2D swings. Window distribution and sizes also diverge from the plan (fewer/different openings, several rendered as large glazed units). Room proportion balance is altered (living/hall and bath zone read differently sized than in plan).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is mostly consistent and doors are generally embedded, but fidelity to the 2D partitioning is reduced around the service core (laundry/closets/bath). Adjacency is mostly correct at a high level, yet at least one closet/service space from the plan is not clearly represented as a distinct enclosed room. A non-plan element (stairs/steps) is introduced, constituting a structural hallucination.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types broadly align (dining table in kitchen/dining, sofa/coffee table in living, beds in bedrooms, tub in bathroom), but exact placement and orientation do not follow the 2D symbols closely. Some items (laundry equipment/storage/closet fittings) are missing or not identifiable, and a few scales feel inconsistent with the implied room sizes (living circulation feels constrained relative to furniture).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric-style presentation with generally good lighting and readable composition. Minor issues: projection is slightly perspective rather than strict orthographic isometric; some geometry reads simplified (door/window detailing and openings) and the inserted stair/step element reduces visual/architectural credibility relative to the source plan.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated staircase/steps/level-change element placed in the living area; the 2D plan shows a single-level floor with no stairs.
Service-core partitioning around hall/bath/closet differs from the plan (interior wall segments and room boundaries do not align to the 2D layout).
One or more closets shown in the 2D plan are not clearly present as distinct enclosed closet rooms in the 3D render (closet count/definition appears reduced/merged).
Laundry room depiction does not clearly match the 2D plan’s dedicated laundry space and its exact enclosure/shape; appears simplified/relocated relative to the plan.
Multiple door positions do not match the 2D plan precisely (notably around bedroom/bath/hall connections); some door leaf placement/swing orientation is inconsistent with the plan.
Window placement/count does not match the 2D plan: several planned exterior windows are missing or resized, and some are rendered as larger glazed openings not indicated in the plan.
Room proportion distortion: the living/hall circulation and the bath zone read as different relative sizes than in the 2D plan (circulation widths and room depth relationships altered).
Bathroom fixture orientation/layout appears changed relative to the 2D plan (tub/vanity/toilet arrangement not matching the drawn configuration).
